summary: Image generation app using Hugging Face API with Stable Diffusion model
architectural_notes: Backend uses Motoko actor with HTTP outcalls to Hugging Face API
Integrates runwayml/stable-diffusion-v1-5 model for image generation
Returns base64-encoded images as data URLs
known_issues: Previous backend changes did not persist after rebuild

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace the entire contents of backend/main.mo with the provided Motoko code that implements HTTP outcalls to the Hugging Face Stable Diffusion v1.5 API (https://api-inference.huggingface.co/models/runwayml/stable-diffusion-v1-5), including imports for Http, Text, Blob, and Base64 modules, a GenerateImageResponse type definition, and a generateImage function that accepts a prompt, makes a POST request with JSON body containing the prompt, encodes the response body as base64, and returns a data URL with the base64-encoded image

projectName: Replace backend main.mo with Hugging Face image generation implementation
